title: Raiz Rewards: 3 new brands – ShopeeFood, Yolofoods & Irvins!
description: Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu 28/10/2022   Raiz Rewards: 3 new brands – ShopeeFood, Yolofoods & Irvins!   This week’s theme is foooood (because what is Malaysia without its variety of food and snacks). We would also like to welcome our 3 new brand partners on Raiz Rewards – ShopeeFood, Yolofoods & Irvins!
body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Copy-of-RR-H01-900-×-506-px-3.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-3-jenama-baru-shopeefood-yolofoods-irvins/)__

__28/10/2022__

__Raiz Rewards: 3 new brands – ShopeeFood, Yolofoods & Irvins!__

This week’s theme is foooood (because what is Malaysia without its variety of food and snacks). We would also like to welcome our 3 new brand partners on Raiz Rewards – __ShopeeFood,__ __Yolofoods__ __& Irvins!__

Get cash bonus (or cashback) while you purchase your food using “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)”! Your cashback will get invested into your Raiz account automatically.

Just go to “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” in your app, search for your favourite brand, and click the “[__Shop Online Here__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” button. We’ll direct you to the brand’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback\*.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

__ShopeeFood (*NEW!*)__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/2-2.png)

__(+up to 0.49% invested)__

Enjoy great, hassle-free deals and a wide array of food and beverages choices with free delivery on __ShopeeFood__ today. Order via the mobile app now!

Shop online now with __ShopeeFood__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 0.49%__ cash bonus\* (of your purchase amount) invested back into your Raiz account.

*\*Only applicable for purchases made through the mobile Shopee app.*

__Yolofood (*NEW!*)__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/5-1.png)__

__(+up to 7% invested)__

__YoloFoods__ delivers wholesome, healthy meal plans and ready-to-eat meals straight to your doorstep. They offer a huge variety of YoloMeals, with more than 90 different ready to eat meals and a la carte dishes to choose from.

Purchase online now with __Yolofood__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 7%__ cash bonus (of your purchase amount) invested back into your Raiz account.

__Irvins (*NEW!*)__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/4-1.png)

__(+5.6% invested)__

__Irvins__ is a dangerously addictive salted egg snacks made using real salted eggs and handpicked aromatic ingredients.

Purchase online now with __Irvins__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __5.6%__ cash bonus (of your purchase amount) invested back into your Raiz account.

__Eat Cake Today__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/3-2.png)

__(+up to 2.45% invested)__

__Eat Cake Today__ is a platform that allows cake lovers and seekers in Malaysia to explore for cakes for birthday parties, celebrations, and even corporate events. They deliver fresh birthday cakes to your door in 4 hours!

Shop online now with __Eat Cake Today__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 2.45%__ cash bonus (of your purchase amount) invested back into your Raiz account.

__Amazin’ Graze__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/1-2.png)

__(+up to 6.37% invested)__

__Amazin’ Graze__ is the purveyor of fun, healthy, tropically inspired snacks. __Amazin’ Graze__ mission is simple: Let’s change the way we snack!

Shop online now with __Amazin’ Graze__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 6.37%__ cash bonus (of your purchase amount) invested back into your Raiz account.

[![raiz rewards](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Explore-Raiz-Rewards.gif)](https://ye77.adj.st/raiz_rewards?adj_t=lwt55og_doqwx9i&adj_deep_link=raiz-my%3A%2F[%E2%80%A6]iz_rewards&adj_fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Frewards)

Want to earn __MORE__ rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM10. Plus, your friend also gets an RM10 bonus! Refer your friends now!
